Title: Delver's Call: Dread Pit
Description:
Two things are bad for business. Earnest competition and nerubians. We need someone to deal with the latter!

We lost a bunch of workers to nerubians in a cave called the Dread Pit. Turns out they're doing something bad over there.

We need you to kick 'em out so we can keep business booming!
ObjectivesText: Complete the Dread Pit delve on any difficulty.

Objectives.Text: The Dread Pit delve completed on any difficulty
